Keywords: Champions , Femizons , Sinister Syndicate , Ultimates
Real Name: Lana Baumgartner
Special Powers
MOTHER-DAUGHTER DUO: Force Blast. If Bombshell is within 3 squares of [SVC] #025 Bombshell she can use Pulse Wave and has PROTECTED: Pulse Wave.
RIDING SHOCKWAVES: Running Shot. When Bombshell knocks back 1+ characters, after resolutions Bombshell may move up to X squares, where X is the highest number of squares a character was knocked back during that action.

Mother-Daughter Duo Trait gives Pulse Wave if they are within 3 of each other.

Coyote's Own
Point #1: I think you talking about the other Bomshell doing a Pulse Wave since this one had Force Blast and EE. Point #2: A character that has PROTECTED can not target by the power included in Keyword. Since she's not targeted the other Bomshell will do full damage if she has one target Point #3: Rule questions are better asked in the rules forum.

Or is it still only 1 Damage, since there is technically another figure in the area of effect, even if that figure is Protected?
